list_definition.definition: (a) settlement of differences in which each side gives up something it has previously demanded

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We argued for a long time but finally arrived at a compromise.

list_definition.definition: to accept less than you originally wanted in order to reach an agreement with someone

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The union is prepared to compromise with the management on the pay issue.

list_definition.definition: to do something which is against your principles or standards

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She refused to compromise her principles and accept money from a known criminal.
